Lovely little place on Carrer Blai that proudly serves artistic pinchos (or pintxos). The people who run this place are really open to talking to non-locals and are more than happy to recommend other places in the area.  Pinchos tend to be cheaper than tapas, so it was definitely a pleasant surprise to know that the bites here were extremely affordable, about 1€ and 1.5€ depending on which plates you got.The pinchos with jamón were in my opinion, the best. Other tapas weren't quite as good, but for that price - you're getting quite the bang out of your Euro.
